text: What's up everybody? I'm Alex and I'm Marko
and we're the brothers and vagabonds behind the
You Tube channel Vagabrothers.
We're about to hop a flight to Rio
but first we want to tell you what our channel is
all about.
Vagabrothers is about getting lost in our connected world
Using social media to seek out the people
building  global culture from the ground up
from the guardians of ancient traditions
to the shapers of the latest trends.
How do you say "cheers" in Estonian?
Terviseks!
Each week we share stories from around the world.
From big cities to remote villages.
from designers putting a new twist on classic styles
to chefs fusing culture through cuisine
to the young people adapting the old ways
to the modern era
The world is a mosaic, and in a time when
cultures and languages are disappearing faster than ever
embracing the diversity of our planet is essential
To do that we seek out the people
who make each place unique
sometimes other You Tubers and sometimes
people with lives totally different to our own
We're in the middle of the Assy Valley
in Kazakstan and we're going to do
a shot with a bunch of Nomads. Let's do it
Ehhhh!!!!
We travel with open minds
Always trying to dance like the locals
and never turning down a meal,
no matter how bizarre
Oh my god. You're going to eat that?
I'm going Vegan after this trip
We take you off the grid to places of stunning beauty
to unplug, dive into nature,
and explore some of the most remote corners
of our planet
Vagabrothers is
both entertaining and educational, which means
we will make you laugh while we teach you about the world
I've just come into London on a trading mission
and I'm famished. What do you recommend from the menu?
Well I ain't fit to eat
off your shoes, Sir
But if you like the game melt,
I'll order it right up
I think I have "merchant's belly!"
For us, travel is about more than just a vacation
It's about experiencing the world's diversity
all while having the time of you life
To the airport, please.
So what are you waiting for? Subscribe to Vagabrothers
to join the journey.  In the mean time, stay curious
keep exploring, and we'll see you on the road.
Peace
